title: Consider Soil Conditions When Winter Feeding Hay

tasks.task: Supplemental winter feeding with hay for cattle.
subtasks: Feeding hay in September, October, early November when conditions are dry.
Managing fall-calving cows in the barn.
Distributing manure back onto hay fields.
Feeding hay in pastures during winter.
Using hay rings or unrolling hay in pastures.
Adjusting feeding method based on ground conditions.
Packing hay out daily if ground is wet and soupy.
Utilizing frozen ground for feeding when possible.
